activities:
As a data controller - we collect information from our customers when they sign up for our services. Specifically, we collect name, contact information, address, and billing information (including credit card). 

As a data processor - we host websites for our customers and use the data collected by the customer through their website only as directed by our customers. We specifically ask our customers not to store and sensitive personal data on our services. Usually the data is limited to name, contact information and address but can include other information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data - name, address, contact information, billing information.
